sgcool_label_text:This is a memoir of Henry Vacher
 who departed from Southampton to work for the Peninsula \u0026 Oriental (P\u0026O) shipping company in Calcutta in 1866. Privately printed and compiled by his son Francis
 this memoir charts Vacher\u0027s life in India and Malaya
 including a vacation he took to Singapore in 1873.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This is a memoir of Henry Vacher, who departed from Southampton to work for the Peninsula & Oriental (P&O) shipping company in Calcutta in 1866. Privately printed and compiled by his son Francis, this memoir charts Vacher's life in India and Malaya, including a vacation he took to Singapore in 1873.
